machine_max_feedrate_x.label: Maximum Speed X
machine_max_feedrate_x.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the X-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_y.label: Maximum Speed Y
machine_max_feedrate_y.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the Y-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_z.label: Maximum Speed Z
machine_max_feedrate_z.description: The maximum speed for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_feedrate_b.label: Maximum Speed B
machine_max_feedrate_b.description: The maximum speed of the filament.

machine_max_acceleration_x.label: Maximum Acceleration X
machine_max_acceleration_x.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the X-direction

machine_max_acceleration_y.label: Maximum Acceleration Y
machine_max_acceleration_y.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Y-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_z.label: Maximum Acceleration Z
machine_max_acceleration_z.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the Z-direction.

machine_max_acceleration_b.label: Maximum Acceleration B
machine_max_acceleration_b.description: Maximum acceleration for the motor of the filament.

machine_acceleration.label: Default Acceleration
machine_acceleration.description: The default acceleration of print head movement.

machine_minimum_feedrate.label: Minimum Feedrate
machine_minimum_feedrate.description: The minimal movement speed of the print head.

path_type.description:
Set the processing method of the object. 
 - Fill: Fills the object with lines or dots.
 - On the Path: Engraves along the shape of the object.
path_type.label: Method

work_speed.label: Work Speed
work_speed.description: Set the speed at which the toolhead moves on the material when it is engraving or cutting.

initial_height_offset.label: Initial Cutting Height Offset
initial_height_offset.description: Offset the cutting path in the Z-direction.

multi_passes.label: Number of Passes
multi_passes.description: Set how many times the laser will trace the same path in a G-code file.

multi_pass_depth.label: Z Step per Pass
multi_pass_depth.description: Set the amount at which the Laser Module is lowered with each pass.

fixed_min_power.label: Minimum Laser Power
fixed_min_power.description: The minimum laser power used for variable power line engraving.

movement_mode.label: Movement Mode
movement_mode.description: Set whether the object is filled with lines or dots.

fill_interval.label: Fill Interval
fill_interval.description: Set the degree to which an area is filled with laser lines or dots. The minimal interval is 0.05 mm.

dwell_time.label: Dwell Time
dwell_time.description: Determines how long the laser keeps on when it’s engraving a dot.

jog_speed.label: Jog Speed
jog_speed.description: Set the speed at which the toolhead moves on the material when it is not engraving or cutting.

direction.label: Line Direction
direction.description: Set the direction of the engraved path. Engraves the path in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal direction.

power_level_divisions.label: Laser Power Level Divisions
power_level_divisions.description: The number of laser power classes divided between the maximum and minimum laser power. The different laser power levels will be associated with the grayscale of the image.

auxiliary_air_pump.label: Auxiliary Air Pump
auxiliary_air_pump.description: It can effectively increase the air flow rate over the laser focus point to achieve better cutting results.However, it may give worse results for non-cutting conditions.
